div.div: Saint John's Univ. vs. Hamline University
at St. Paul, Minn. | Klas Field

tr.td: Johnnies win toss and defers. Hamline receives from West
Jimmie Mattson kickoff 66 yards to the HU4, Kevin Ackerley return 20 yards to the HU24 (Nolan Lortz).
